Title: The people's railways, (expanding with) tremendous pace
Designer: Chinese National Science Popularization Association (中华全国科学技术普及协会)
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社)
Notes: A 1952 series, devoted to the reconstruction of war damage and new construction of railways.The map on this opening pages shows the situation in 1951. The solid red lines are repaired tracks; the white-red rimmed lines are newly constructed tracks; the dotted red lines are planned tracks; and the black-and-white lines (on Taiwan), are "not yet liberated" lines.
